meanings.definition: The quality of having a ready insight into things; shrewdness.
meanings.sent1: Her perspicacities in solving problems amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: His perspicacities in business helped him make wise decisions.
meanings.sent3: The detective's perspicacities led to solving the case in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her perspicacities were like a sharp sword cutting through confusion.
meanings.sent5: The professor's perspicacities made the complex topic easy to understand.

meanings.definition: The ability to understand things quickly and make accurate judgments.
meanings.sent1: The student's perspicacities in math impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent2: She used her perspicacities to navigate through the tricky situation.
meanings.sent3: His perspicacities in guessing games always led to winning.
meanings.sent4: The CEO's perspicacities were like a compass guiding the company.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's perspicacities saved many lives during the emergency.
